title: Fav ult to use in the game
body: Mine would be the dunk masters ultimate

{{champion:14}} : *uses ult to run away after taking a tower* COWARDS!!!

{{champion:245}}  Because  his ult has many names and choices 
1. WHOOPS I F**CKED UP (Using your ultimate to disengage from a fight you know you would lost)
2. 404 HEALTH BARS NOT FOUND (Using ultimate on squishes)
3. I AM THE MATRIX (Dodging ezeral, vi, jinx, karthus ultimates) 
4. ULTIMATE SHOPPING ( You go back to base and buy something and heal and then ult back to lane within 4 seconds)
Or you can teleport to a lane (if you use that), get royally screwed within the first 2 seconds and ult back to fountain.
{{champion:86}} It's not even a good ultimate, it's only really ever used to just be a big "Fuck you" to somebody you don't like

Might seem small, but I have always loved Kha'Zix ultimate. Vanishing in the middle of fights only to reappear where they don't expect you is just so satisfying, My only wish is that I could do it more often.

Jhin's is also really fun when used at the right times, watching everyone scatter to get out of the line of fire as the music plays.
Man am I a simple person, i see kha, its not negative, upvoted

Whoa slow down there, friend. I like pissing off assassin mains, not giving them PTSD.
{{champion:29}} Sewer Skewers for Everybody!
Twitch has the second best dialogue in the game (gotta hand it to TK)
I always felt the flash was more "get me as far away from the enemies that will try and capitalize on the knock-up as possible".
My favorite part is when a carry flashes behind their entire team and screws over every other squishy on their team in the process.
See that's strategy, if they are busy capitalizing on the rest of your team dying then they can't attack you!

Step 4: ???
Step 5: Get out of Bronze by playing only Orianna and be trash at 90% of other champions.

{{champion:14}} 

It was what drew me to his rework.  Beforehand it was {{champion:80}}.  But Sion's ult takes the damn cake and smashes it over some poor bastard's head.

There's little I enjoy quite as much as tossing a {{champion:267}} ult down one of the long jungle corridors and watching it slowly roll over a far away straggler who just happens to be in the worst position to escape it.

{{champion:6}} 's ult situationally is one of my favorites, especially when you successfully disorient the victim so much that they use abilities in the opposite direction than they intended. One game I managed to trick an enemy Volibear into tossing me three or four times back into safety after switching places with him. That was fun.

{{champion:98}} Turn a gank into a 3v1, that should be sufficient~
{{champion:62}} Hoo HOOOOOOOOO
